name: Bullet Hole
description:
Thanks to Lusyok and JamSpread for helping make this game!

Controls (Because I didn't have time to make a tutorial)

(Keep volume low at first and adjust as you want)

Left click to shoot portal out

Right click to bring portal in

While the portal is out, it uses energy. (Use the portal to absorb bullets)

When the portal is in, you recharge energy. (Press Space Bar to release bullets back at the enemies)

Get to the teleported to get to the next level.

TIP

Keep moving and use the portal defensively if you find yourself stuck.
